Rhevannas are hunters, binders, and devourers of [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23). They rage that virtue comes easy for the lucky and privileged, and their bitter hearts yearn to subjugate the holy. A rhevanna's shadow appears as a pitiful angelic silhouette that claws for release; often, this form is that of the latest celestial the rhevanna destroyed. Rhevannas can't see their own shadows, and remarking upon one is especially dangerous. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 49 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 47 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44 [Rhevanna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1021) **Source** [Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege](/Sources.aspx?ID=54) pg. 83 **Perception** +42; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet, [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +36, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +38, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +42, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +43, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +37, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +38, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +36, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +40 **Str** +10 **Dex** +8 **Con** +6 **Int** +6 **Wis** +8 **Cha** +11 **Items** black sapphires (4, worth 2,000 gp each), _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [spiked chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60)_ --- **AC** 48 **Fort** +33 **Ref** +39 **Will** +36 +1 status to saves vs. magic **HP** 400 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects **Weaknesses** good 20 **Plunder Life** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 60 feet. When a [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) effect restores Hit Points to a non-[fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) creature in the aura, the amount of Hit Points restored is halved. The rhevanna gains temporary Hit Points equal to the amount of Hit Points restored. The rhevanna loses any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 40 feet, fly 80 feet **Melee** _spiked chain_ +43 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 3d8+18 slashing plus 3d6 evil **Melee** claw +40 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 4d6+18 slashing plus 3d6 evil **Divine Innate Spells** DC 45 - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **5th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (at will; self only) - **9th** [Bind Soul](/Spells.aspx?ID=21) (at will), [Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70) (at will), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Possession](/Spells.aspx?ID=225) - **10th** [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87) - **Constant (5th)** [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (good only), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Rituals** DC 45 - **5th** [Call Spirit](/Rituals.aspx?ID=5) - **6th** [Planar Binding](/Rituals.aspx?ID=17) - **8th** [Imprisonment](/Rituals.aspx?ID=13) **Detaining Strike** **Frequency** once per round; **Trigger** The rhevanna hits a creature with a weapon Strike; **Effect** The rhevanna casts an innate [_dimensional anchor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=70) spell on the creature. **Lifedrinker** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Trigger** The rhevanna kills a living creature of at least 16th level; **Effect** The rhevanna drinks the triggering creature's life force and regains 40 Hit Points. If the triggering creature is a [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), the rhevanna instead regains 80 Hit Points. **Malefic Binding** The rhevanna can target [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) with their [_bind soul_](/Spells.aspx?ID=21) ability, and a gem containing a celestial bound by a rhevanna has Hardness 40. If the rhevanna destroys a gem in which they placed a celestial, the celestial is destroyed forever.
Deep Wells of Spite The boundless hate rhevannas feel toward [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), and [angels](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=3) in particular, has led more than one unwise scholar to opine that rhevannas are bitter, fallen angels. Yet rhevannas also hold special grudges against [psychopomps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=83), who oversee the progression of souls.
name: Rhevanna
